item.title: Implementation of Job Queue model using goroutine and channel
Go Concurrency Model
item.description: Intro This article aims to summarize what I have learnt about Go’s concurrency model Concurrency and Parallelism Goroutines goroutine is a cheap independently executing function, which has its own call stack. goroutine is not a thread, a thread can have multiple goroutines. However, for the point of understanding, it’s not far off to think of it as a very cheap thread. In go you can use goroutine like below with go keyword.
